constructor-arg.value: select m.movie_id, m.name_russian, m.name_native, m.year_of_release, m.description, m.rating, m.price, m.picture_path from movie m inner join movie_genre mg on m.movie_id = mg.movie_id where mg.genre_id = ?
select m.movie_id, m.name_russian, m.name_native, m.year_of_release, m.description, m.rating, m.price, m.picture_path from movie m

insert into movie (name_Russian, name_Native, year_Of_Release, description, rating, price, picture_path) values (:nameRussian, :nameNative, :yearOfRelease, :description, :rating, :price, :picturePath);

update movie set name_Russian = :nameRussian , name_Native = :nameNative , year_Of_Release = :yearOfRelease , description = :description , rating = :rating , price = :price , picture_path = :picturePath where movie_id = :movieId;

select m.movie_id, m.name_russian, m.name_native, m.year_of_release, m.description, m.rating, m.price, m.picture_path from movie m where lower(m.name_russian) like CONCAT('%', lower(:nameRussian), '%') or lower(m.name_native) like CONCAT('%',lower(:nameNative),'%');
